column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hi Michelle - Thank you very much for the 5-star review! We greatly appreciate it. In the coming weeks
column2: we will open our third location in Katy
column3: which hopefully will alleviate some of the crowds at our Midtown location. But
column5: we appreciate your understanding of our extended wait times
column6: and we hope to see you again in the near future.
